img.alt: Long Beach Public Schools Mission Statement Banner

p.em: The mission of the Long Beach Public Schools is to develop inquiring, knowledgeable and enthusiastic students who value and demonstrate critical thinking and problem solving.

Through collaborations and partnerships, Long Beach Public School graduates will be compassionate, life-long learners capable of achieving their personal goals as self-sufficient, responsible and contributing citizens of a diverse global community.
